A ladder can be used as a bookshelf. Place books or other items on the rungs of the ladder to create a unique and space-saving bookshelf.
A ladder can be used as a desk organizer. Use the rungs to hang shelves, hooks, and other organizers to keep your desk clutter-free.
A ladder can be used as a towel rack. Hang towels and bathrobes on the rungs of the ladder to keep them easily accessible.
A ladder can be used as a clothing rack. Hang clothes on the rungs of the ladder to dry or to organize your wardrobe.
A ladder can be used as a step stool. Use the rungs of the ladder as a step stool to reach high shelves or to change light bulbs.
